mapper.insert: INSERT INTO springbootmanager.article(title, author, date, content) VALUES (#{title}, #{author}, #{date}, #{content})
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, author, date, SUBSTRING(content, 1, 300) as content FROM springbootmanager.article
SELECT COUNT(id) as total FROM springbootmanager.article WHERE title like CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
